short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts a random fact in your email signature

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pulls random facts from https://uselessfacts.jsph.pl/ and puts one at the bottom of every email you write. Currently works only for Gmail. Also available on Firefox.
